name: Random Blocks
description:
Random Blocks gives your computer the ability to communicate through colors and sound!

The code we put into Random Blocks allows your computer to pick any block, give the block any color and any sound variation it chooses all at a predetermined interval.
Is it purely random, is it communication, is it art, or is it nothing at all?
One thing is for sure… it’s unique.

While you’re watching your computer make its own creative decisions, you can ask questions and receive answers... including finding out your lucky number of the day!

So, sit back, relax, and enjoy as your computer shows its creative side.
